findings.title: #2: Adhoc key derivation scheme allows for the selection of weak keys
findings.description: The ad-hoc key derivation scheme used previously allowed for the selection of weak keys.

findings.title: #4: High-entropy RNG does not guarantee high entropy
findings.description: The `HighEntropyRandomGenerator` is used as a source of cryptographically secure randomness but it's based on `std::random_device`, which is not guaranteed to be high-entropy or cryptographically secure.

findings.title: #5: Custom implementation of Ed25519-SHA3-512
findings.description: Custom implementation of Ed25519-SHA3-512 is no longer relevant since the Ed25519 implementation included seems to be a standardized one with no custom SHA3-512 implementation.

findings.title: #8: Protocol content is not confidential
findings.description: Logging system does not ensure confidentiality of protocol content.
